name: Genshin Impact Dottore Visual Novel: Lost Chapter 2
name_original: Genshin Impact Dottore Visual Novel: Lost Chapter 2
description:
• You're able to collect and interact with items during your exploration in the abandoned lab.
  • Get special endings and interactions depending on the items you collect and the choices you make.

The story is heavily focused on the things that happened in the first game.

Feedback is appreciated :3

[Hope you also like the clone original character I put in this]
